text: DeStefano is an Italian surname. People with the surname include: *Sam DeStefano, American gangster *Mike DeStefano, American comedian *Chris DeStefano, American singer *Mario Anthony DeStefano, American gangster *Lauren DeStefano, American author *Anthony DeStefano, American author *Frank DeStefano, medical researcher *Joe DeStefano, politician *Robert DeStefano, American chiropractor *John DeStefano (disambiguation), several people *Fred DeStefano, American football player *Stephen DeStefano, American comics artist ==See also== *De Stefano *Di Stefano *Ricci v.
